html:
May 27 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including ADP, Hill & Smith and Smith+Nephew Plc, on Thursday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* ADP ADP.PA: JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 97 from EUR 93

* Aveva AVV.L: Barclays raises to overweight from equal weight

* Hill & Smith HILS.L: Peel Hunt raises target price to 1,950p from 1,500p

* Kuehne Und Nagel International AG KNIN.S: Credit Suisse ups PT to CHF 213 from CHF 206

* Smith+Nephew Plc SN.L: JP Morgan raises target price to 1,542p from 1,423p


Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Thursday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.


* ADP ADP.PA: JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 97 from EUR 93

* Ageas SA AGES.BR: Kepler Cheuvreux raises target price to EUR 48.6 from EUR 44.9

* Airbus Group AIR.PA: Vertical Research raises target price to EUR 154 from EUR 145

* Alfa Laval AB ALFA.ST: RBC raises price target to SEK 360 from SEK 290

* Alpha Fx Group Plc AFX.L: Liberum raises target price to 1800p from 1550p

* Arkema SA AKE.PA: HSBC raises target price to EUR 110 from EUR 104

* Aveva AVV.L: Barclays raises target price to 4060p from 3730p

* Aveva AVV.L: Barclays raises to overweight from equal weight

* Benchmark Holdings Plc BMKB.L: HSBC raises target price to 71p from 61p

* Besqab AB (Publ) BESQ.ST: Kepler Cheuvreux raises target price to SEK 190 from SEK 170

* Blue Prism Group Plc PRSMB.L: Canaccord Genuity raises to speculative buy from hold

* British Land BLND.L: Morgan Stanley raises target price to 450p from 410p

* Caixabank CABK.MC: Citigroup raises price target to EUR 2.85 from EUR 2.8

* Centamin Plc CEY.L: Liberum initiates coverage with sell rating; target price 82p

* Coats Group COA.L: HSBC raises target price to 61p from 60p

* Credit Suisse Group AG CSGN.S: Barclays raises target price to CHF 12.5 from CHF 12

* Deutsche Bank AG DBKGn.DE: KBW cuts to underperform from market perform

* Deutsche Post AG DPWGn.DE: UBS raises target price to EUR 60 from EUR 57.5

* Deutsche Telekom AG DTEGn.DE: Morgan Stanley raises target price to EUR 23.5 from EUR 23

* Deutsche Wohnen SE DWNG.DE: Berenberg cuts to hold from buy

* Essity AB (Publ) ESSITYa.ST: Morgan Stanley cuts target price to SEK 280 from SEK 290

* Ferrovial FER.MC: JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 27 from EUR 24

* Fevertree Drinks Plc FEVR.L: HSBC raises target price to 2820p from 2550p

* Firstgroup Plc FGP.L: Citigroup raises price target to 114p from 90p

* Flatexdegiro AG FTKn.DE: Berenberg raises target price to EUR 165 from EUR 130

* Gateley Holdings Plc GTLY.L: Stifel raises target price to 240p from 190p

* Glenveagh Properties Plc GLV.I: Credit Suisse raises price target EUR 1.04 from EUR 0.91

* Go-Ahead GOG.L: Citigroup raises price target to 1450p from 1115p

* Gym Group Plc GYM.L: Barclays raises target price to 320p from 265p

* Gym Group Plc GYM.L: Liberum raises target price to 325p from 295p

* Heidelbergcement AG HEIG.DE: Jefferies raises target price to EUR 108.1 from EUR 96

* Hill & Smith HILS.L: Peel Hunt raises target price to 1,950p from 1,500p

* Iberdrola IBE.MC: Independent Research raises PT to EUR 11.30 from EUR 10.90;rating hold

* Impax Asset Management Group Plc IPX.L: Berenberg raises PT to 1,310p from 1,250p

* Impax Asset Management Group Plc IPX.L: Peel Hunt raises price target to 1180p from 900p

* Inditex ITX.MC: Barclays raises target price to EUR 30 from EUR 28

* Invinity Energy Systems Plc IES.L: Canaccord Genuity raises target price to 300p from 260p

* Ipsen SA IPN.PA: JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 95 from EUR 85

* KBC Groep NV KBC.BR: RBC initiates coverage with price target of EUR 70

* KBC Groep NV KBC.BR: RBC initiates coverage with sector perform rating

* Kering PRTP.PA: RBC raises target price to EUR 775 from EUR 680

* Koninklijke Ahold Delhaize NV AD.AS: Credit Suisse raises PT to EUR 23 from EUR 22

* Kuehne Und Nagel International AG KNIN.S: Credit Suisse ups PT to CHF 213 from CHF 206

* M&G MNG.L: RBC raises target price to 260p from 230p

* Marks and Spencer Group MKS.L: Barclays raises target price to 200p from 165p

* Mediclinic MDCM.L: BofA Global Research cuts price objective to 324p from 334p

* Meggitt MGGT.L: UBS raises to neutral from sell; raises price target to 491p from 359p

* National Express NEX.L: Citigroup raises price target to 350p from 300p

* Nextstage SCA NEXTS.PA: Portzamparc cuts PT to 98.3 from EUR 98.7; rating "accumulate"

* NN Group NV NN.AS: Kepler Cheuvreux raises target price to EUR 50 from EUR 48.4

* Pan African Resources PAFR.L: Berenberg initiates coverage with buy rating; PT 27p

* Pets at Home PETSP.L: Peel Hunt raises target price to 525p from 500p

* Prosiebensat 1 Media SE PSMGn.DE: JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 28 from EUR 27

* Renewi Plc RWI.L: Peel Hunt raises target price to 85p from 64p

* Residential Secure Income Plc RESIR.L: Jefferies raises target price to 110p from 105p

* Royal Unibrew A/S RBREW.CO: Bryan Garnier raises target price to DKK 840 from DKK 790

* RWE AG RWEG.DE: Kepler Cheuvreux cuts target price to EUR 35 from EUR 40

* Sabadell SABE.MC: Citigroup raises price target to EUR 0.70 from EUR 0.50

* Severn Trent SVT.L: HSBC raises target price to 2780p from 2570p

* Smith+Nephew Plc SN.L: JP Morgan raises target price to 1,542p from 1,423p

* Stagecoach Group Plc SGC.L: Citigroup raises price target to 65p from 55p

* Strix Group Plc KETL.L: Stifel raises target price to 330p from 320p

* Swisscom AG SCMN.S: Berenberg raises target price to CHF 380 from CHF 340

* Tharisa Plc THST.L: Berenberg cuts target price to 190p from 200p

* UBS Group AG UBSG.S: KBW raises to outperform from market perform

* Vectura Group Plc VEC.L: Stifel cuts to hold from buy

* Vectura Group Plc VEC.L: Stifel raises target price to 155p from 133p

* Vistry Group Plc VTYV.L: UBS raises target price to 1440p from 1170p

* Xlmedia Plc XLM.L: Berenberg raises target price to 76p from 75p

* Young & Co'S Brewery Plc YNGa.L: Stifel raises target price to 1750p from 1650p
